channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Explore the Lourdes Archives and see the actual rock on which the feet of the Mother of God stood, letters by St. Bernadette written in her own hand, and other fascinating Lourdes treasures rarely seen by the public. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen says that at a time when man has more and more material conditions for happiness, he's multiplying wars. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 22 THEY WILL SEE HIM FACE TO FACE AND HIS NAME WRITTEN ON THEIR FOREHEADS. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about older Catechisms of the Catholic Church, forgetting sins when in confession, and why Protestants say Augustine and Aquinas were Calvinists. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explain why even the problem of evil cannot swallow up the fact that God exists. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sister Thomas Aquinas explains how the bishops and the Pope can trace their line of authority back to the 12 Apostles in this engaging catechetical lesson for children (Grade Level 2). (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Thomas and his wife Helen teach their children Alex and Sarah abbout the life of St. Dominic Savio. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: On today?s show, host Joseph Pearce reviews a classic storiy of pride and vanity in Oscar Wilde?s ?The Picture of Dorian Gray.? He also examines the pilgrimages of Hilaire Belloc in ?The Path to Rome and ?The Four Men.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Noelle Mering analyzes the ?woke? movement, and offers an alternative rooted in deep interpersonal relationships and the human need to live in truth, and to be known and loved. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: How can we bring out the Gold Rule in people, perhaps in a business or a nonprofit organization? (30 minutes).
